name: DEB's 'Flate Training
description:
WARNING: Contains belly inflation fetish content.

Note: I am not a part of Team Quimbly or the development of Project: Quimbly.

Hello! Here's a new mini-game, created to help promote Project: Quimbly, which is currently in alpha development, and available at https://teamquimbly.itch.io/pjquimbly. It features DEB, the debug girl available in-game, drawn by the Team Quimbly member lilstinker. In this mini-game, you are testing DEB's capacity, as well as her ability to increase that capacity under pressure. To do this, you will use a dispenser to create compressed-air pills to feed her, which will then inflate her belly. Pay attention to visual and audio cues, and try to get close to her limit without going over!

Controls:

Press R to reset
Press Z to advance the text on the second screen

On the warning screen, there are button toggles for sound, hyper mode, and popping:
The sound button mutes/unmutes all audio, and is also in the testing room.
Hyper mode toggles the range of sizes that DEB's belly will appear in-game (as well as growth rate). Note that normal mode is closer to her intended sizes in Project: Quimbly, while hyper mode is closer to my other mini-games.
If popping is enabled, there will be a cartoony popping effect for when DEB's limit is surpassed. You will not need to restart the game if this happens; she'll recover in a few seconds regardless of this toggle.

Click and hold the blue button on the dispenser to charge an air pill.
Release the button to drop the air pill, which will appear larger based on how long the dispenser was charged.
Charging the dispenser for too long will cause a temporary malfunction.
Click and drag the air pill to DEB's mouth to feed it to her, which will immediately start inflating her for a short but slightly-varying amount of time.
Alternatively, if you don't think she can hold the air, you can dispose of the air pill in the trash can on the left and start again.

Click on DEB's belly to thump it, purely for testing purposes. It will rebound less, with different sound effects, based on how tight it is.
Hold down left mouse button on DEB's belly to rub it, certainly for testing purposes. Rubbing it gives a loose indication of if she's more than halfway to capacity, and can also cause a burp, relieving a bit of pressure.

If DEB's belly surpasses its current capacity, she'll faint for a bit and release the air. Her capacity stays the same, though, so it's just a matter of getting her back to her previous size. If popping is enabled, instead her belly will pop to the same effect, and with no lasting consequences.

If DEB's belly is very close to its limit when the air pill runs out, her capacity will increase with a "fwoomp" sound effect, and then a burp. When her capacity reaches the highest available point, the dispenser's display will read "fin" to signal the end of the mini-game.
